name: FROG (only4developer)
description:
Hello everyone, this is my first time participating in a Game Jam, Hope you like my game, it still have some minor bugs to be fixed, but well Im very prod of what I made on 3 days, lets see who make the best highscore! .

Tips

Use the map to locate what you need!
Food = Yellow dots
Health = Pink dots
Evolve Frog = Green dots
Enemies = Red dots

CONTROLLS

Arrow Keys - Joystick Axis = Face the direction you want to Move
X = Dash/Swim forward, you can tap or hold for more force.
Z  = (When in Frog Stage) Attack with tongue to eat flies.
